title: United Airlines Discounted Economy Awards to Hawaii The Points Guy

type_specific.selection: Last week, United began offering discounted economy awards to South America. This week, the airline rolled out yet another MileagePlus award sale; this time to Hawaii. United normally charges 22,500 miles each way for economy flights between the mainland US and Hawaii, but with this promo, you can save 20% and book round-trip economy awards for 36,000 miles....

This week, the airline rolled out yet another MileagePlus award sale; this time to Hawaii. United normally charges 22,500 miles each way for economy flights between the mainland US and Hawaii, but with this promo, you can save 20% and book round-trip economy awards for 36,000 miles....
